author: Staff Reporter
text: Thoothukudi Central Police have filed a case in connection with wall posters pasted at public places in violation of model code of conduct. In a statement from Returning Officer of Thoothukudi Assembly constituency here on Monday, content on the wall post was found to be provoking caste conflict. They did not have the name and address of the printer. Sources said G. Hariraghavan, president, Public Rights Protection Centre, Thoothukudi, was arrested for the incident.
title: Code violation: man arrested
